NAME: Ankit Srivastava
ABOUT:
I am a Computer Science graduate from IIT Mandi. My professional interests includes Algorithms, Software Development, Optimisation, Scalability, Web Applications, Distributed Systems, Big Data and Problem Solving. 

I feel comfortable working with technologies such as Python, Java, C, C++, Spring, Hibernate, ElasticSearch, Kibana, MySQL, MongoDB, SqlAlchemy, HTML, CSS, Angular JS ,Docker.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Design of hybrid mobile charger(solar, electric, wind)
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Designed a working hybrid mobile charger that can use electrical energy, solar energy and mechanical energy to charge a mobile. It also has an inbuilt battery that can store energy and can be used as and when required.
